about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Engineer & Full-Stack Developer
about.p1: With a background in microengineering and deep expertise in full-stack development, I specialize in creating innovative and high-performance technological solutions.
about.p2: My approach combines technical rigor, creativity, and multilingual communication to deliver projects that exceed my clients' expectations.

projects.title: Featured Projects
projects.subtitle: Discover my most recent projects and the technologies used

zigoma.title: ZIGOMA ERP
zigoma.description: Intelligent modular ERP for SMEs with CRM, product and stock management, full sales flow (quotes, orders, delivery notes, invoices) and integrated AI.

wellsync.title: WellSync
wellsync.description: Intelligent wellness mobile app with AI for tracking emotions, nutrition, fitness, and self-care routines.

healthsync.title: HealthSync
healthsync.description: Medical tracking platform connecting patients and doctors for treatment and appointment management.

beautybooker.title: BeautyBooker
beautybooker.description: Booking platform for beauty services with slot management, online payments, and customer loyalty system.

selfservicedesk.title: SelfServiceDesk
selfservicedesk.description: Quick ordering mobile app for restaurants with intuitive interface, stock management, and real-time analytics.

fromdeepestrecord.title: FromDeepestRecord
fromdeepestrecord.description: Multilingual music e-commerce with advanced catalog, AI recommendations, and integrated streaming system.
